item.description:
Do you like the water? Do you like to play in the water? Well we will be playing and having fun with Trailblazers first "Water Day" come enjoy yourself at "Merrymeeting Lake, (the second cleanest lake in NH).

Do you enjoy sailing, well I will take people in my "16 foot Hobie Cat" sailboat or my "Force 5" racing sailboat, then again if it's not windy enough you could always try my "hydroplane" boat or drive a jetski.

We will have a potluck lunch in the middle of the lake!

Do you scuba dive, well we will have a couple of air tanks available for anyone brave enough to try scuba diving or if you have your own gear we could dive for sunken treasure!

We will take a cruise around the lake in a pontoon party boat!

So bring your jetski's, sailboat, kayak's or whatever you have and come to "Water Day" we will be watersking and windsurfing!

We could boat over to the famous "rope swing" and splash into the water!

I will let people try "sculling" (rowing a scull boat)

Take a tour of the biggest fish hatchery in New England right next to where we will be meeting.

So bring your bathing suits, mask and snorkel, kayaks, jetski's, sailboat's or whatever type of boat that you would like to share with others! And don't forget your potluck lunch.

If people want to share the cost of gas that would be great; please ask for contributions.

If you have an extra life jacket bring it.

Bring your water guns, water balloons, or any other water fighting blaster for a water gun fight!

Please no alcohol or glass bottles.

So come one, come all for a fun filled day of water fun! Please let me know if you are bringing a boat.

If it's raining I will notify everyone by email that we will be rescheduling this event.

If you have any questions I can be reached by phone at 603-509-0907. Note: I do not have reception at the lake or up in that area on my cell phone.

We will be leaving McDonald's restaurant at 12 pm or you could meet us at the Dam at the entrance of Merrymeeting lake, near the fish hatchery.

See you there!

Peter
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me there or look for a "Meetup" sign.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Water Day
